name: Witch's Tavern
description:
In this game we cooking dinners, but when we don't have for example chicken (for chicken soup) we can add to soup anythink else (like rat,  spider eye, blood...) - You can hunt the rat using knife (it is on table)

Controls: WASD - Movement; Mouse - Looking; E - get order from client; LMB - Drag object; RMB - Throw dragged object

[Game Created for Weekly Game Jam, week 95; 2 programmers and 1 3D graphics in team]
